verbose_text: Notably, genetic ablation of T-bet or neutralization of the pro inflammatory cytokines interferon (IFN)-gamma and tumor necrosis factor (TNF) promoted Tfh cell differentiation, and restored previously impaired GC responses, demonstrating that inflammatory responses associated with the induction of symptomatic malaria reduce the magnitude of MBC responses by modulating effective Tfh cell development.
evidence: interferon (IFN)-gamma and tumor necrosis factor (TNF) promoted Tfh cell differentiation
